        "Granularity: One of the biggest pain point is that FlowMart focuses on policy-level tracking of business activity (new policies), creating inability for a consistent view for various personas",

        "Middle Market: Uses submission-level data, typically accessed via BI Workstation. less integrated with FlowMart.",
        "Northland/Northfield: Semi-autonomous with their own legacy quoting systems (NorthLink, NorthStar), rely on Oracle-based analytics.",
        "AgriBusiness: Still heavily mainframe-dependent; data is only partially moved to cloud; lacks structured quoting data.",
        "Data Consistency Challenges : Business users report data discrepancies (e.g., mismatched counts, missing attributes). Inconsistent refresh timelines across data sources impact decision-making.",

        "Policy History Limitation : The quote history is limited as only key quote versions or final quotes are stored. If a policy was touched multiple times before issuance, FlowMart does not have every touchpoint, hindering analysis of quote revision frequency or agent shopping behavior.",

        "REQ-02",
        "REQ-07",
        "REQ-08",
        "REQ-10"
      ]
    },
    {
      "title": "Observations - Reporting workstream",
      "content": [
        "No Single Source of Truth: Inconsistent data across the ecosystem is resulting in business and IT teams getting conflicting dashboards and reports that create trust issues in the data. (SCBA MSTR vs. Excel reports)",
        "Missing Data : Missing the data from other sources and attributes, let SCBA MicroStrategy team to build the adhoc process to reconcile the data at the dashboards level. (Policy ID creation)",
        "Use of manual scripts: The SCBA MicroStrategy team has created python scripts to create datasets on SharePoint that are consumed by the “Know Your Flow” dashboard. These scripts are manually executed (although there is an effort in process to automate these scripts).",
        "Manual Data Validation: DQ checks are performed manually for the datasets used by MSTR Know Your Flow dashboard.",
        "Multiple schedule of refresh: Due to multiple sources we have multiple manual rechecking for data and refresh those sources to get latest data",
        "Data Security: Dashboard access is granted at the full-dashboard level. Not aligned to user-specific roles or data restrictions.",
        "Too Many Dashboards: Too many dashboards in NorthLand/NorthField can overwhelm the data consumers with too much information that may become inaccurate, stale and irrelevant for drawing valuable insights."
      ],
      "relatedRequirements": [
        "REQ-02",
        "REQ-07",
        "REQ-08",
        "REQ-10"
      ]
    },
    {
      "title": "Challenges of Current State FlowMart",
      "content": [
        "Specific Design: Only sources SELECT LOB data, is not integrated with other small commercial business LOBs viz. AgriBusiness and Northland/Northfield",
        "Granularity: Each LOB has a different data model; does not have the same common grain across all three small commercial business LOBS",
        "Outdated Technology: The platform is heavily reliant on legacy technologies which limits its agility.",
        "Fragmented Data Sources: Complicated to make any enhancements to current design of FlowMart",
        "Data Availability : Unable to get right data to regional and field VPs in a timely manner at their fingertips. Limited visibility on who touched the submissions data",
        "Missing Data Attributes: Current Flowmart is missing additional Key Attributes.",
        "Missing Linage : Does not provide insights into abandoned quotes & all the iterations of a quote transaction across its lifecycle to identify a new vs. existing quote",
        "Data Management Shortcomings: Although Datalog exists, it lacks Completeness, Does not adhere to Travelers' data management practices",
        "Historical Tracking: We can only have the latest view of a quote transaction, whereas we want a row for every single time the RQI is called",
        "Manual Integration: Due to missing policy data and drawbacks of ETL technical design, a lot of manual processes and custom scripts must be created"
      ],
      "relatedRequirements": [
        "REQ-01",
        "REQ-02",
        "REQ-07",
        "REQ-08"
      ]
    },
    {
      "title": "Our understanding - FlowMart Business Value Proposition",
      "content": [
        "FlowMart is a data mart that empowers Business Insurance leaders to understand, monitor, and optimize the business lifecycle- from submission to quote to issued policy—with a focus on the Small Commercial segment.",
        "Visibility into Sales Funnel Health: Tracks the complete flow lifecycle: Submission → Quote → Issuance, Enables insight into quote conversion and policy issuance trends, Supports Hit Ratio, Quote Ratio, and Flow Metrics, helping identify bottlenecks and optimization points.",
        "Performance Management: Assesses agent, product, and regional performance, Helps in making data-driven decisions to improve sales productivity, Drives accountability by providing visibility into business outcomes.",
        "Pricing & Product Effectiveness: Evaluates the impact of pricing strategies and underwriting guidelines, Surfaces trends in quote volumes, declined submissions, and hit ratios tied to business rules, Aids in competitive pricing by comparing conversion

"Data Governance & Security : Limited data governance is implemented using Travelers' DataLog, an Alation solution with data cataloging and data domains. Data lineage, business glossary for

"Data Quality : Basic DQ rules exist in ETL layers (Ab Initio). Error logs are generated by ab-initio scr

es or data restrictions.",

"title": "Current State : Data Governance – FlowMart",
"FlowMart-related data sources are cataloged in DataLog (Alation), which integrates with platforms like Teradata Vantage, SQL Server, Snowflake, and Ora
"Stewardship model is active, with Agile team members designated as data stewards for various applications, but not yet for FlowMart.",
"Data Lineage and Business Glossary has been maintained manually in RDEM (Required Data Elements Mapping) Excel Spreadsheet by ETL development team.",
"AgriBusiness, Northland/Northfield has incomplete metadata in DataLog.",
"Business rules, data logic, and transformation details are not fully captured in governance tools- manually maintained i
"No row-level access control in MSTR dashboards, only dashboard-level access control. Sensitive data (e.g., PII) is generally not tagged in DataLog.",
"Basic data profiling viz. Nulls, Record Counts, Duplicates etc. are performed in ETL logic."
"title": "Current State : Data Quality – FlowMart",
"Data Quality in FlowMart is very limited and at the introductory level.",
"Technical Checks includes like NULL value, Data formatting, and Duplicate detections.",
"Data quality rules is not captured and documented, not able to validate any rules created for Business V
"Rejected Data is Reviewed manually on a need basis.",
"AgriBusiness and Northland/Northfield have controls built into UI itself to prevent any data quality issues at source itself."
"Middle Market: Uses submission-level data, typically accessed via BI Workstation. less integrated with FlowMart.",
"AgriBusiness: Still heavily mainframe-dependent; data is only partially moved to cloud; lacks structured quoting data.",
"Data Consistency Challenges : Business users report data discrepancies (e.g., mismatched counts, missing attributes). Inconsistent refresh timelines across
data sources impact decision-making.",
"Future Needs : Improve Submission-Issue Efficiency, Enhance Data Freshness & Accuracy, Increase Analytical & Reporting Agility, and Enable Seamless Integration & Sc
"Maintenance complexity: Data flows across multiple systems, starting from source systems, then moving through Teradata and multi
"Missing Data: Missing the data from other sources that are used in MSTR dashboard (Know Your Flow). Some of this data collected at
"Inconsistent Data Updates: Data updates in the FlowMart is inconsistent, Most of the updates flows but saw some inconsistency while
"Operational Costs: Across small commercial market, current legacy applications, databases, integrations & development tools have significant operations and infrastructure costs."
"title": "Observations - Data workstream",
"The data workstream in current FlowMart is highly operational but fragmented. It's built for business agilit
"Data Strategy : FlowMart operates as a market-specific data mart-primarily for SELECT Small Commercial. Ab Initio used by FlowMart and Northland teams for core
"Diverse Data Storage : Current data resides in various storage platform like Teradata (FlowMart core), SQL Server (FlowMart), Oracle (Northland/Vista), Snowflake (external & modern sour
"Data Model : Dimensional data model with star schema. Dimensions are stored as Type 2 and history is captured in all the Dimensio
ns and Facts tables. Semantic views exist in Teradata (SELECTMI_VIEWS) with Hardcoded logic.",
"Inconsistent Refresh Schedules : FlowMart data refreshes daily at 2 AM EST, completed by 7 AM. Python dashboards: Manually refreshed monthly, taki
"Data Governance & Security : Limited data governance is implemented using Travelers' DataLog, an Alation solution with data cataloging and data domains. Data lineage, business glossary for
anaged via SailPoint but lacks row-level access controls. Different security models for on-prem Teradata, SQL Server, and Snowflake.",
"Data Stewards : Data Steward model is place for Governances but not lot of activity and information is not updated in Da
"Data Quality : Basic DQ rules exist in ETL layers (Ab Initio). Error logs are generated by ab-initio scr
ipts, but data errors are not routinely addressed by business users. Every 30 days these error logs get deleted. N
"No Single Source of Truth: Inconsistent data across the ecosystem is resulting in business and IT teams getting conflicting dashboards and repor
ts that create trust issues in the data. (SCBA MSTR vs. Excel reports)",
"Missing Data : Missing the data from other sources and attributes, let SCBA MicroStrategy team to build the adhoc process to reconc
ile the data at the dashboards level. (Policy ID creation)",
"Use of manual scripts: The SCBA MicroStrategy team has created python scripts to create datasets on SharePoint that are consumed by the “Know Your Flow” dashboard. These scripts are manually e
"Manual Data Validation: DQ checks are performed manually for the datasets used by MSTR Know Your Flow dashboard.",
"Multiple schedule of refresh: Due to multiple sources we have multiple manual rechecking for data and refresh those sources to get latest data",
"Data Security: Dashboard access is granted at the full-dashboard level. Not aligned to user-specific rol
es or data restrictions.",
"Too Many Dashboards: Too many dashboards in NorthLand/NorthField can overwhelm the data consumers with too much information that may become inaccurate, stale and irrelevant for drawing va
"Specific Design: Only sources SELECT LOB data, is not integrated with other small commercial business LOBs viz. AgriBusiness and Northland/Northf
"Granularity: Each LOB has a different data model; does not have the same common grain across all three small commercial business LOBS",
"Fragmented Data Sources: Complicated to make any enhancements to current design of FlowMart",
"Data Availability : Unable to get right data to regional and field VPs in a timely manner at their fingertips. Limited visibility on who touched
the submissions data",
"Missing Data Attributes: Current Flowmart is missing additional Key Attributes.",
"Data Management Shortcomings: Although Datalog exists, it lacks Completeness, Does not adhere to Travelers' data management practices",
"Manual Integration: Due to missing policy data and drawbacks of ETL technical design, a lot of manual processes and custom scripts must be created
"FlowMart is a data mart that empowers Business Insurance leaders to understand, monitor, and optimize the business lif

"title": "Current State : Data Governance – FlowMart",
"FlowMart-related data sources are cataloged in DataLog (Alation), which integrates with platforms like Teradata Vantage, SQL Server, Snowflake, and Ora
"Stewardship model is active, with Agile team members designated as data stewards for various applications, but not yet for FlowMart.",
"Data Lineage and Business Glossary has been maintained manually in RDEM (Required Data Elements Mapping) Excel Spreadsheet by ETL development team.",
"AgriBusiness, Northland/Northfield has incomplete metadata in DataLog.",
"Business rules, data logic, and transformation details are not fully captured in governance tools- manually maintained i
"No row-level access control in MSTR dashboards, only dashboard-level access control. Sensitive data (e.g., PII) is generally not tagged in DataLog.",
"Basic data profiling viz. Nulls, Record Counts, Duplicates etc. are performed in ETL logic."
"title": "Current State : Data Quality – FlowMart",
"Data Quality in FlowMart is very limited and at the introductory level.",
"Technical Checks includes like NULL value, Data formatting, and Duplicate detections.",
"Data quality rules is not captured and documented, not able to validate any rules created for Business V
"Rejected Data is Reviewed manually on a need basis.",
"AgriBusiness and Northland/Northfield have controls built into UI itself to prevent any data quality issues at source itself."
"Middle Market: Uses submission-level data, typically accessed via BI Workstation. less integrated with FlowMart.",
"AgriBusiness: Still heavily mainframe-dependent; data is only partially moved to cloud; lacks structured quoting data.",
"Data Consistency Challenges : Business users report data discrepancies (e.g., mismatched counts, missing attributes). Inconsistent refresh timelines across
data sources impact decision-making.",
"Future Needs : Improve Submission-Issue Efficiency, Enhance Data Freshness & Accuracy, Increase Analytical & Reporting Agility, and Enable Seamless Integration & Sc
"Maintenance complexity: Data flows across multiple systems, starting from source systems, then moving through Teradata and multi
"Missing Data: Missing the data from other sources that are used in MSTR dashboard (Know Your Flow). Some of this data collected at
"Inconsistent Data Updates: Data updates in the FlowMart is inconsistent, Most of the updates flows but saw some inconsistency while
"Operational Costs: Across small commercial market, current legacy applications, databases, integrations & development tools have significant operations and infrastructure costs."
"title": "Observations - Data workstream",
"The data workstream in current FlowMart is highly operational but fragmented. It's built for business agilit
"Data Strategy : FlowMart operates as a market-specific data mart-primarily for SELECT Small Commercial. Ab Initio used by FlowMart and Northland teams for core
"Diverse Data Storage : Current data resides in various storage platform like Teradata (FlowMart core), SQL Server (FlowMart), Oracle (Northland/Vista), Snowflake (external & modern sour
"Data Model : Dimensional data model with star schema. Dimensions are stored as Type 2 and history is captured in all the Dimensio
ns and Facts tables. Semantic views exist in Teradata (SELECTMI_VIEWS) with Hardcoded logic.",
"Inconsistent Refresh Schedules : FlowMart data refreshes daily at 2 AM EST, completed by 7 AM. Python dashboards: Manually refreshed monthly, taki
"Data Governance & Security : Limited data governance is implemented using Travelers' DataLog, an Alation solution with data cataloging and data domains. Data lineage, business glossary for
anaged via SailPoint but lacks row-level access controls. Different security models for on-prem Teradata, SQL Server, and Snowflake.",
"Data Stewards : Data Steward model is place for Governances but not lot of activity and information is not updated in Da
"Data Quality : Basic DQ rules exist in ETL layers (Ab Initio). Error logs are generated by ab-initio scr
ipts, but data errors are not routinely addressed by business users. Every 30 days these error logs get deleted. N
"No Single Source of Truth: Inconsistent data across the ecosystem is resulting in business and IT teams getting conflicting dashboards and repor
ts that create trust issues in the data. (SCBA MSTR vs. Excel reports)",
"Missing Data : Missing the data from other sources and attributes, let SCBA MicroStrategy team to build the adhoc process to reconc
ile the data at the dashboards level. (Policy ID creation)",
"Use of manual scripts: The SCBA MicroStrategy team has created python scripts to create datasets on SharePoint that are consumed by the “Know Your Flow” dashboard. These scripts are manually e
"Manual Data Validation: DQ checks are performed manually for the datasets used by MSTR Know Your Flow dashboard.",
"Multiple schedule of refresh: Due to multiple sources we have multiple manual rechecking for data and refresh those sources to get latest data",
"Data Security: Dashboard access is granted at the full-dashboard level. Not aligned to user-specific rol
es or data restrictions.",
"Too Many Dashboards: Too many dashboards in NorthLand/NorthField can overwhelm the data consumers with too much information that may become inaccurate, stale and irrelevant for drawing va
"Specific Design: Only sources SELECT LOB data, is not integrated with other small commercial business LOBs viz. AgriBusiness and Northland/Northf
"Granularity: Each LOB has a different data model; does not have the same common grain across all three small commercial business LOBS",
"Fragmented Data Sources: Complicated to make any enhancements to current design of FlowMart",
"Data Availability : Unable to get right data to regional and field VPs in a timely manner at their fingertips. Limited visibility on who touched
the submissions data",
"Missing Data Attributes: Current Flowmart is missing additional Key Attributes.",
"Data Management Shortcomings: Although Datalog exists, it lacks Completeness, Does not adhere to Travelers' data management practices",
"Manual Integration: Due to missing policy data and drawbacks of ETL technical design, a lot of manual processes and custom scripts must be created
"FlowMart is a data mart that empowers Business Insurance leaders to understand, monitor, and optimize the business lif

"Data Quality : Basic DQ rules exist in ETL layers (Ab Initio). Error logs are generated by ab-initio scr
ipts, but data errors are not routinely addressed by business users. Every 30 days these error logs get deleted. N

es or data restrictions.",

the submissions data",

"Stewardship model is active, with Agile team members designated as data stewards for various applications, but not yet for FlowMart.",

"AgriBusiness, Northland/Northfield has incomplete metadata in DataLog.",
"Business rules, data logic, and transformation details are not fully captured in governance tools- manually maintained i
"No row-level access control in MSTR dashboards, only dashboard-level access control. Sensitive data (e.g., PII) is generally not tagged in DataLog.",
"Basic data profiling viz. Nulls, Record Counts, Duplicates etc. are performed in ETL logic."
